product_name: INNO Tire Hold 1-Bike Hitch Rack Add-On
long_description: The INNO Tire Hold 1-Bike Hitch Rack Add-On easily attaches to your INNO Tire Hold Hitch rack, allowing you to carry one additional bike on your hitch rack. No wheel removal required and almost no frame contact; dual ratchet arms lift up and over the wheels to secure bikes in place. Fits 20 - 29 in. wheels up to 2.7 in. wide; low-to-ground design makes loading bikes a breeze. Includes keys and locks; rear ratchet tire holder locks to keep bike secure. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes.
short_description: The INNO Tire Hold 1-Bike Hitch Rack Add-On easily attaches to your INNO Tire Hold Hitch rack, allowing you to carry one additional bike on your hitch rack.
